item.description: Invited conference talks 2015 May 14    Confinement and Disordered Confinement in Anomalous Diffusion Stochastic Modeling of Anomalous Dynamics in Complex Physical and Biological Systems Hugo Steinhaus Center, Wrocław University of Technology 2014 September 7    Local and global geometry in entanglement percolation Quantum Technologies Conference V Jagiellonian University, Kraków, Poland 2013 September    Entanglement Distribution on Networks Quantum Technologies Conference IV, Warsaw University of Warsaw
